content:
React Pokedex is a SPA build in react that use poke-api to get a list of pokemons and detail from them
Stack:
Reactreact-reduxRTK Querytheme-uiImage captionhttps://salvarez-pokedex.netlify.app/
https://github.com/salvarezm/pokedex-webapp
summary: React Pokedex is a SPA build in react that use poke-api to get a list of pokemons and detail from them
title: React Pokedex

content: Welcome to my personal site, where I store my projects such as sample projects, proofs of concept, Hello Worlds, and anything shareable or showable. By the way, I’m a Capybara.
